name: Just A Ghost
description:
Platformer game with a ghost as the main character roaming around the numerical universe and devouring zeros. Jump, move forward, but don't forget to look around your self, cause every number counts... When you try to eat non-zero number, the patron of numbers will steal your health, so be aware of that... Enter your infinity tour

Don't forget your mouth is only 4 block wide. Have fun :)
